lines: Your charge: find the Artillery Witch and end her thunder.
Report says a heretic priest stalks the outskirts—keep holy steel ready.
An ecclesiastic prisoner is missing. His mission failed; find his trail.

lines.speaker: Commander
lines.text: Stand to, soldier. New Antioch bleeds while the Artillery Witch shells our borders.

lines.speaker: Commander
lines.text: Three matters require your ear. Choose your counsel.

choices.text: [Extraction] Hunt the Artillery Witch and recover the artifact from her domain
[Payload] Escort the supply shipment through enemy-held territory
[Trench Raid] Infiltrate the enemies trenches and take their artifact back to your position
Tell me about the Artillery Witch.
The missing ecclesiastic prisoner—what of him?

lines.speaker: Commander
lines.text: Test deployment selected. Return to the zone when ready.

lines.speaker: Commander
lines.text: Extraction mission confirmed. Eliminate the Witch and secure the artifact.

lines.speaker: Commander
lines.text: Payload escort confirmed. Protect the shipment at all costs.

lines.speaker: Commander
lines.text: Trench raid confirmed. Move through the mud and take their Artifact back to us. Steel yourself—it's dark work.

lines.speaker: Commander
lines.text: She is artillery wrapped in blasphemy. Keep moving—her thunder punishes the still.

lines.speaker: Commander
lines.text: Break her wards, press the assault, and do not parley with fear.

lines.speaker: Commander
lines.text: A heretic priest was sighted in the region—cunning and venom-tongued.

lines.speaker: Commander
lines.text: If he turns the flock, we fight two fronts. If you cross him, strike first and ask no catechism.

choices.text: If found, he will not leave standing.

lines.speaker: Commander
lines.text: An ecclesiastic prisoner—sent on penitent duty—has gone missing.

lines.speaker: Commander
lines.text: He failed his mission, yet the man may still be turned to service. Find him if you can.

choices.text: If I find him, what then?

lines.speaker: Commander
lines.text: If he shows contrition, bind him to the task: the Witch must fall.

lines.speaker: Commander
lines.text: If he turns heretic, deliver judgment. Mercy for the faithful; fire for the faithless.

lines.speaker: Commander
lines.text: Go, then. Steel steady, heart steady. New Antioch watches.
